articles.title: Why South Africa Has Dragged Israel To World Court On Genocide Charges - NDTV
articles.description: South Africa has taken Israel to the International Court of Justice (ICJ) on charges of committing genocide in Gaza.
articles.content:
The 84-page submission to the ICJ accuses Israel of genocidal acts in Gaza.
